solution_line_template: The total amount of money she spent is ${meat_cost} + ${chicken_cost} + ${veggies_cost} + ${eggs_cost} + ${dog_food_cost} = $<<{meat_cost}+{chicken_cost}+{veggies_cost}+{eggs_cost}+{dog_food_cost}={total_spent}>>{total_spent}
Add this to the amount she had left over to find the amount of money she brought at the beginning: ${total_spent} + ${money_left} = $<<{total_spent}+{money_left}={initial_money}>>{initial_money}
